mapper.insert: insert into cust(id, password, name, email) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.select: select * from cust where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select id from cust where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cust where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update cust set name=#{name}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
